attributes.action: BBC Last night of the proms.
attributes.additional_details: As Boris states: "I think it's time we stopped our cringing embarrassment about our history,"
attributes.background: Instruct the BBC they cannot play instrumental versions of Rule, Britannia and Land of Hope and Glory at the last night of the proms on 12th September 2020. Instead they must be performed with the usual lyrics.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the BBC Proms are a matter for BBC, which is operationally independent, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can read the BBC's announcement of the programme for the Last Night of the Proms here: https://www.pressparty.com/pg/newsdesk/BBC1/view/223541/
